price: They rather say, “We found our forefathers on a path, and we are seeking guidance in their footsteps.”
arabic: بَلۡ قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّا وَجَدۡنَآ ءَابَآءَنَا عَلَىٰٓ أُمَّةٖ وَإِنَّا عَلَىٰٓ ءَاثَٰرِهِم مُّهۡتَدُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
